channel.title: A new world...World 2!
channel.description:
something got a discussion going in regards to another world! Basically it'll be a world which is (almost) pure vanilla. So:
[ul][li]Creeper explosions on (does block damage)[/li][li]No residence (bad plugin)[/li][li]A border limit (This is good! It means the world map can be updated a lot more, and there is a lot closer communities!)[/li][li]The staff will be active, because the server doesn't suck![/li][li]PVP disabled (no fighting!)[/li][li]anti xray mod (no xraying!)[/li][li]Potential lwc locks (free locks!)[/li][li]A close together community, where we can't kill the shit out of each other, and one with active staff![/li][/ul]
This won't effect the current world, at all. Opinions?

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Travas:

[quote]September 8th is the goal Jeb is aiming at for the ‘PAX version’, aka what you saw at PAX. aka, NO NPCS. NO SKILLS. NOTTA! Still waiting to clarify if villages will be in-or-out due to the ‘placement’ issue.

Everything else will be released some other time.[/quote]

more proof on minecraft facebook page thats its gonna be this week

http://www.facebook.com/#!/minecraft

Read full topic

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

September 8th is the goal Jeb is aiming at for the 'PAX version', aka what you saw at PAX. aka, NO NPCS. NO SKILLS. NOTTA! Still waiting to clarify if villages will be in-or-out due to the 'placement' issue.
Everything else will be released some other time.

Read full topic

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:119, topic:412949”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=514421.msg3739054#msg3739054 date=1315148091]

Considering I prefer to use the dark as a shield, this sounds fucking awesome. If it’s all we can do, I’m game.

rey we can make a raiding settlement will be just like old times

Yep. Get a new skin and make it super fucking dark.
I think at night, you shouldn’t be able to see a nametag unless they are 10 blocks away from you. If there is a wall between you and another person, even if it’s 3 blocks away, you can’t see them. Any bukkit plugin like that?

May I join? c: I miss the old Akatsuki raids we did. Back when we had Tabby, Vain, and Kracky.
[/quote]
Welcome to the team. We’ve got 3 of the 6 oldschool people.[/quote]

tom wants to join us i told him he can as long as he doesnt raid chests

Read full topic

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

PvP at night sounds awesome. It’d be more fun/challenging for non-pvpers because they’d have to retreat to a bunker or something at night to protect themselves.

I remember when I first played minecraft on SP I thought mobs were more intelligent and could open doors etc, so made secret underground tunnels and hid in them at night. This was fun until I realised mobs were harmless as long as you have a door+torches.

Read full topic

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s funny because as I was typing my long post a page or two back I was thinking about PvP at night, and how it would just increase the challenge when the actual monsters are out there. I think it would probably work.

And that’s saying something because you know how much I usually am opposed to PvP ;D

Read full topic

item.title: A new world...World 2!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Then everybody turns PvP off and the people who do want pvp have to fight each other. I agree it’s an efficient way to get rid of them. We should just do what Fat Cookies suggested and have two worlds, one for creative and one for pvp.

Read full topic
